snippet.title: Return to Castle Monkey Ball - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Now for FREE!: https://nickireda.itch.io/return-to-castle-monkey-ball
B.J. just got a whole lot ballsier. Collect bananas, find treasure, defeat guards, and escape the fortress!

Beloved games Wolfenstein 3D, created by Id Software & published by Apogee Software in 1992, and Super Monkey Ball, created by Amusement Vision & published by Sega in 2001, have crossed paths in this totally free arcade fangame!

Fight your way through eight procedurally generated floors to escape the fortress! Collect bananas and treasure to maximize your score and defeat guards for time bonuses! Just get to the end before the timer runs out! Lose all three of your lives and it's game over for you.

Are you tough enough to take on this challenge and break free from the grips of your captors?

This game exists as a free fan project, that operates within fair use under an educational license, and will not accept donations or compensation of any kind. Rights for all non-original assets belong to their proper holders. Additional credit info can be found within the game itself under the "read this" page.

CM Created by: @Kobayashi's Ego

★ 𝐅𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰 𝐌𝐞 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐜𝐞𝐬 ★
𝐏𝐚𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐨𝐧 ►https://www.patreon.com/AutisticYui
♦ Get Access To Some Of The Files Used To Make My Videos!
𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐫𝐝 ► https://discord.gg/DMgGZuc
♦ Come Say Hi And Get Some Great Bear Emotes :D
𝐌𝐞𝐫𝐜𝐡 ► https://goo.gl/gsc35G
♦ Bears And More!
𝐓𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 ► http://www.Twitter.com/Nickireda
♦ Both Related And Unrelated Info As Well As Updates!
𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦 ►https://www.instagram.com/autistic_yui
♦ Dumb Things Often!
𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐏𝐚𝐥 ► http://www.paypal.me/Nickireda 
♦ Donations Not Necessary But Helps Pay For My College 💗
